index_terms: DEPARTMENT OF HOUSING AND URBAN DEVELOPMENT
summary: AN ORDINANCE authorizing an agreement for an acceptance of financial assistance from the United States, Department of Housing and Urban Development, for an Urban Development Action Grant (UDAG) to assist in the development of the Wright Neighborhood Project, authorizing implementation of a project by the Department of Community Development and making an appropriation from the Housing Community Development Revenue Sharing Fund therefor and establishing a repayment account in said fund; and authorizing the Mayor or his designee to enter into any necessary implementing agreements.
